sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Member } from '../entity/member'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login-page', templateUrl: './login-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login-page.component.css'] }) export class LoginPageComponent { showLogin = true; member:Member={ memberId: 0, firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', password: '', gender: '', mobileNo: '', forgetPasswordAnswer: '' } onSubmit(){ } }

Login

Please enter your login and password!

Email is required
Pattern should be "john@gmail.com"
Password is required
Password must be at least 8 characters
1 UpperCase, 1 LowerCase Latter and Also Contain Number
Forget Password

Don't Have account? Register Here

Login

Please enter your login and password!


Forget Password Answer is required
